text: @GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump Donny, there are currently more than 1.5 Million Americans infected with COVID-19, and only in the last 24Hr the US added approx 50,000 COVID-19 patients, of all these people approx 10% of them will die of it. And you, your only thinking of your self, your self, your self....... https://t.co/RwXaAkQdPY
